author: IGN
description: Meet the classes of Villainy in this latest trailer for the upcoming game of cooperation and betrayal. Gather your party of 4-10 players, but trust no one. Heroes and Villains plot against each other in quick, highly intense matches. Deception is your greatest weapon, and secrecy is the ultimate defense. Villainy will be available on PC via Steam.
title: Villainy - Official Classes Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the announcement trailer for Tetra Rise, an action-platformer with roguelite elements game developed by Tora Games. You're at rock bottom, time to upgrade your equipment and face ever-growing hordes as you climb toward the surface. Every defeated enemy turns into a fixed block you can use to climb closer to the surface. Tetra Rise is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #gaming
title: Tetra Rise - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Chapter Seven: Pacific Break is live now! 
Check out the Chapter 7: Pacific Break gameplay trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Switch up your strats with new mechanics like Simple Build and Self-Revive, take to the air with the Wingsuit, and choose your own unlock path in the revamped Battle Pass. While the Battle Bus is out of commission, you'll Storm Surf your way to the Island instead! 
Catch you on the Golden Coast!

#IGN #gaming #FortniteChapter7Pacific Break
title: Fortnite Chapter 7: Pacific Break - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Oh. What. Fun., a comedic holiday family film distributed by Amazon Prime Video. Enjoy the festivities of the season with a chaotic family dynamic in Oh. What. Fun., streaming on December 3 on Amazon Prime Video.

Claire Clauster is the glue that holds her chaotic, lovable family together every holiday season. From perfectly frosted cookies to meticulously wrapped gifts, no one decks the halls quite like Claire. But this year, as her grown kids and distracted husband get swept up in their own seasonal dramas, they make one crucial mistake: they forget their mom. By the time they realize she's missing, Claire’s already set off on a festive adventure of her own - one that doesn’t involve cooking, cleaning, or coordinating anyone else’s chaos. As her family scrambles to find her and salvage their Christmas, Claire rediscovers what the holidays mean when you’re finally free to put yourself first.

Oh. What. Fun. stars Michelle Pfeiffer, Felicity Jones,
title: Oh. What. Fun. - Official Trailer (2025) Michelle Pfeiffer, Felicity Jones, Chloë Grace Moretz

author: IGN
description: Welcome to Atropia, a fake nation created by the U.S. military to train soldiers before their deployment. These simulated towns—built by Hollywood set designers—are brought to life by role players hired to create a sense of “authenticity.” When an aspiring actress (Alia Shawkat) in a military role-playing facility falls in love with a soldier (Callum Turner) cast as an insurgent, their unsimulated emotions threaten to derail the performance. What unfolds is an audaciously funny satire that asks: In the performance of war, who are the winners and who are the losers?
title: Atropia - Official Trailer (2025) Alia Shawkat, Callum Turner

author: IGN
description: The moon has split open, exposing an alien megafactory within. Your mission: Pilot a ramshackle ship to its core and shut it down. Just one catch... it can only be controlled with cards. Build synergies, adapt in real-time, and save Earth from the Night Machine before it's too late. Watch the Night Machine trailer for this deckbuilding roguelike game to see gameplay and learn about your objective. Night Machine will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.
title: Night Machine - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description: In the twilight of the Gilded Age, murder strikes the estate of an eccentric and failing tycoon. As he hosts the era's biggest celebrities including Thomas Edison, Edgar Degas and Evelyn Nesbit, lies, mystery and ambition collide as the truth is shockingly revealed.
title: The Artist - Official Final Trailer (2025) Mandy Patinkin, Zachary Quinto, Janet McTeer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Red Band Trailer for Fackham Hall, a comedy spoof of Downton Abbey with Airplane! and Monty Python distributed by Bleecker Street. Get lost in the shenanigans of Fackham Hall, in theaters on December 5.

Fackham Hall follows lovable pick-pocket Eric Noone as he lands a job at a unique English manor house. He quickly rises through the ranks, and a forbidden romance with lady-of-the-house Rose Davenport blossoms. But when an unexpected murder occurs, Eric gets framed - leaving Rose and her family’s future perilously uncertain.

Fackham Hall stars Thomasin McKenzie, Ben Radcliffe, Katherine Waterston, Emma Laird, Tom Goodman-Hill, Ramon Tikaram, Tim Mcmullan, Anna Maxwell Martin, Sue Johnston, Tom Felton, and Damian Lewis. The film is directed by Jim O’Hanlon and written by Steve Dawson, Andrew Dawson, Tim Inman, Jimmy Carr, and Patrick Carr.

Fackham Hall is in theaters on December 5.
title: Fackham Hall - Official Red Band Trailer (2025) Damian Lewis
